Summary: black shadowed saucer shaped two red lights hovered and rocked also shot out white beams
divs: Sighting Detailsi was in a car with four occupents two in the front two in the back. i and anotger man were in the backseat of the car. i looked to the left and seen a dark black shadowed saucer shaped thing to say the least. it hovered and rocked it had two red lights on each end. then the object shot out white beams on and off rapidly into the hudson when i first seen the object i was trying to rationalize that it was a hellicopter but i could clearly see this was something different something i nevter seen. for the longest i couldn't figure out what that was id just like someone to have an explanation as to what i seen.we were driving on the bridge as we went forward it went out of view.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around June 12th 2012
